author: nooK ttocS
content:
And more recently, Enron and the energy traders took
corruption and evilness to a whole new level.

author: Sean Percival
content:
one thing good about moving is "the purge" why was i
keeping bills from 2004 in my file cabinet? shredded
so much tonight. feeling enron

author: Andy Boyd
content:
Just gob smacked after watching the Enron
documentary - we always did wonder how they made
money - and of course they didn't

author: Nick Ramirez
content:
I've shredded my weight in paper today, maybe I
should've worked at Enron
